Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's Run still has complete coverage! But you'll have to walk a bit to get to it: the clubhouse is closed as is the clubhouse parking lot. Classic tracks are very hard pack or ice but still deep enough to stay on the track. The skating lane is hard pack but several people were skating without any trouble. Me? Klister. But my Rex "Oi" just wasn't working very well, probably because of the rushed job of waxing. Great day to doublepole!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track. Trails were packed on Tuesday.
nubsNob.comments:
Merry Christmas from all of us at Nub's Nob. We are open from 11:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today.
Pintail Peak Lodge is also open. Santa will be skiing on Big Time today. Everything is groomed and in great condition to enjoy Christmas on the slopes. Make it a great Christmas Day at Nub's Nob.
